scenario_text.value:
Shuuji, everyone’s lost things important to
them. Are you okay?

Of course! How could they be so careless as
to lose something here?!

What? If you have something to say, then say
it.

Uh, didn’t you just say you couldn’t find
your wallet?

Urk... Uh, don’t worry about it!
I don’t need a wallet in this world, do I?!

(Even Shuuji lost something...
I wonder what’s going on?)

Please keep that thing about my lost wallet
to yourself, okay?

Got it.
...I’ll also try and look for it.

No need, really!
...But I appreciate the sentiment.

Please keep that thing about my lost item to
yourself, all right?
